DataElement.preferredDefinition: Value to signify the number of medical devices placed on or inserted in an anatomic site for accurate visualization of a particular area, prior to radiation treatment or surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A medical device placed on or inserted in an anatomic site for accurate visualization of a particular area, prior to radiation treatment or surgery.  Examples include markers inserted in the prostate gland for visualization of the site affected by cancer, prior to radiation therapy; markers taped to the scalp prior to imaging in frameless stereotactic brain surgery; and femoral and tibial pins used for patial orientation in total knee replacement._Position or arrangement, as of the teeth; the state of being placed or arranged, as the assignment of a person to a appropriate clinical study._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A medical device placed on or inserted in an anatomic site for accurate visualization of a particular area, prior to radiation treatment or surgery.  Examples include markers inserted in the prostate gland for visualization of the site affected by cancer, prior to radiation therapy; markers taped to the scalp prior to imaging in frameless stereotactic brain surgery; and femoral and tibial pins used for patial orientation in total knee replacement.

Concepts.definition: A medical device placed on or inserted in an anatomic site for accurate visualization of a particular area, prior to radiation treatment or surgery. Examples include markers inserted in the prostate gland for visualization of the site affected by cancer, prior to radiation therapy; markers taped to the scalp prior to imaging in frameless stereotactic brain surgery; and femoral and tibial pins used for spatial orientation in total knee replacement.

Property.preferredDefinition: Position or arrangement, as of the teeth; the state of being placed or arranged, as the assignment of a person to a appropriate clinical study.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: Position or arrangement, as of the teeth; the state of being placed or arranged, as the assignment of a person to a appropriate clinical study.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/11/17 tt transferred context, added reg status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support Lombardi Cancer Center Cyberknife study.
